tuv.seg: Lobbying usually involves making views known to politicians and public servants about laws, policies and practices and possibly seeking to have those laws, policies and practices changed

Is iondúil go mbaineann cur in iúl dearcthaí leis an mbrústocaireacht do pholaiteoirí agus do sheirbhísigh phoiblí i leith dlíthe, beartas agus cleachtas; agus b’fhéidir féachaint chun na dlíthe, beartais agus cleachtais úd a athrú
Lobbying takes many different forms
Is iomaí cineál stocaireachta ann
You may be making your views known as a private citizen on issues which directly affect you or you may be making submissions or representations on issues that affect many people

D’fhéadfá do dhearcthaí mar shaoránach príobháideach a chur in iúl i leith saincheisteanna a théann i bhfeidhm go díreach ort nó d’fhéadfá bheith ag déanamh aighneachtaí nó láithreoireachtaí a théann i bhfeidhm ar go leor daoine
You may be lobbying in person or you may get someone else to lobby on your behalf
D’fhéadfá bheith ag brústocaireacht go pearsanta nó d’fhéadfá duine éigin eile a fháil chun stocaireacht ar do shonsa
You may conduct the lobbying in writing or orally
D’fhéadfá an bhrústocaireacht a dhéanamh i scríbhinn nó ón mbéal

The Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015 came into effect on 1 September 2015 and provides that certain people who are carrying on lobbying activities must register with the Standards in Public Office Commission

Tháinig An tAcht um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil 2015 i bhfeidhm an 1 Meán Fómhair 2015 agus is ann a fhoráitlear go gcaitheann daoine áirithe a bhíonn i mbun gníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta clárú leis An Coimisiún um Chaighdeáin in Oifigí Poiblí
They must also provide information about their lobbying activities
Ní foláir dóibh faisnéis a sholáthar i leith a ngníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta freisin
The Register of Lobbying which is maintained by the Commission is publicly accessible on lobbying.ie
Bíonn An Clár Brústocaireachta inrochtana don phobal, arb é an Coimisiún a chothabhálann é, ag lobbying.ie
In general, the people who are required to register are:
Is iad na daoine a chaitheann clárú de ghnáth ná:
• Professional lobbyists who are paid to lobby on behalf of others
• Brústocairí gairmiúla a íoctar chun brústocaireacht a dhéanamh ar son daoine eile
• Individuals and commercial organisations with more than 10 full time employees who are lobbying on their own behalf
• Daoine aonair agus eagrais tráchtála le níos mó ná 10 bhfostaí lánaimseartha a bhíonn ag brústocaireacht ar a sonsan
• Representative bodies with at least 1 full-time employee and the lobbying is carried out by a paid employee or office holder
• Comhlachtaí ionadaíocha le fostaí lánaimseartha amháin ar a laghad agus gurb é fostaí íoctha nó sealbhóir oifige a dhéanann an bhrústocaireacht

• Advocacy groups, non-governmental organisations and charities which have at least 1 full-time employee and which promote particular interests or causes, and the lobbying is carried out by a paid employee or office holder

• Grúpaí abhcóideacha, eagrais neamhrialtasacha agus cumainn charthanais le fostaí lánaimseartha amháin ar a laghad agus a chuireann chun cinn leasanna nó cúiseanna faoi leith, gurb é fostaí íoctha nó sealbhóir oifige a dhéanann an bhrústocaireacht
Other individuals may be obliged to register if they are engaged in lobbying in relation to the development or zoning of land
D’fhéadfaí go gcaithfeadh daoine aonair eile clárú má bhíonn siad páirteach sa bhrústocaireachta i ndáil le forbairt nó le criosú talún
See ‘Development and zoning of land’ below
Féach ‘Forbairt agus criosú talún’ thíos
You must register if:
Caithfidh tú clárú má:
• You are carrying on lobbying activities
• Má bhíonn tú i mbun gníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta
• The person you are lobbying is a designated public official
• Más oifigeach poiblí ainmnithe é an duine a bhfuil tú á bhrústocaireacht
• You are making a relevant communication
• Má tá tú ag déanamh cumarsáide ábhartha
• The communication is about a relevant matter and is not an excepted communication
• Má bhaineann an chumarsáid le gné ábhartha agus ní cumarsáid eisceachtúil í
The communication must be with a designated public official
Caitheann an chumarsáide bheith le hoifigeach poiblí ainmnithe
Designated public officials are:
Is iad na hOifigigh phoiblí ainmnithe:
• Ministers of the Government and Ministers of State
• Airí Rialtais agus Airí Stáit
• Other members of Dáil Éireann and Seanad Éireann
• Baill eile de Dháil Éireann agus Seanad Éireann
• Members of the European Parliament for constituencies in the State
• Feisirí Pharlaimint na hEorpa i leith na dtoghcheantar sa Stát
• Members of local authorities
• Baill na nÚdarás Áitiúil
• Prescribed public servants and office holders
• Seirbhísigh phoiblí agus sealbhóirí oifige forordaithe
Public bodies are obliged to publish information on their employees who are designated public officials
Ní mór do chomhlachtaí poiblí faisnéis faoina bhfostóirí a fhoilsiú ar oifigigh phoiblí ainmnithe iad
You must be making a relevant communication
Caitheann tú bheith ag déanamh cumarsáide ábhartha
A relevant communication means an oral or written communication made personally (directly or indirectly) to a designated public official in relation to a relevant matter
Ciallaíonn cumarsáid ábhartha cumarsáid scríofa nó béil a dhéantar go pearsanta (go díreach nó go hindíreach) le hoifigeach poiblí ainmnithe i ndáil leis an ngné ábhartha
It does not include certain types of communication
Ní áirítear léi cineálacha cumarsáide áirithe
See ‘Excepted communications’ below
Féach ‘Cumarsáidí Eisceachtúla’ thíos
A relevant matter means any matter relating to:
Ciallaíonn gné ábhartha aon ghné a bhaineann le:
• The initiation, development or modification of any public policy or of any public programme,
• Tionscnamh, forbairt nó modhnú aon bheartais phoiblí nó aon chláir phoiblí,
• The preparation or amendment of any law
• Ullmhú nó leasú aon dlí
• The award of any grant, loan or other financial support, contract or other agreement, or of any licence or other authorisation involving public funds
• Deonú aon deontais, iasachta nó tacaíochta airgeadais eile, conartha nó comhaontaithe eile, nó d’aon cheadúnas nó údarú eile lena mbaineann cistí poiblí
It does not include any matter relating only to the implementation of any such policy, programme, enactment or award, or which is of a technical nature
Ní áirítear léi aon ghné nach mbaineann ach amháin le forfheidhmiú aon bheartais, cláir, achtacháin nó deonaithe mar é, de chineál teicniúil
Certain types of communication, known as excepted communications, are not considered to be lobbying under the legislation
Ní cheaptar cineálacha cumarsáide áirithe, ar a dtugtar cumarsáid eiscthe, de bheith ina mbrústocaireacht de réir na reachtaíochta
• Communications by or on behalf of an individual relating to their private affairs about any matter other than the development or zoning of land
• Cumarsáid leis an duine nó ar a sonsan maidir lena ngnóthaí príobháideacha i leith aon ghné seachas forbairt nó criosú talún
• Communications requesting factual information or providing factual information in response to a request for the information
• Cumarsáid ina bhfiafraítear faisnéis fhíorasach nó ina dtugtar faisnéis fhíorasach mar fhreagra d’iarratas ar fhaisnéis
• Communications requested by a public service body and published by it
• Cumarsáid arna hiarraidh ag comhlacht seirbhíse poiblí agus arna foisliú aige
You can find more information on excepted communications on lobbying.ie
Is féidir leat teacht ar a thuilleadh faisnéise i leith cumarsáide eiscthe ar lobbying.ie
Development and zoning of land
Forbairt agus criosú talún
You are considered to be lobbying if you make a relevant communication about the development or zoning of land under the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2014
Ceaptar tú de bheith ag brústocaireacht má dhéanann tú cumarsáid ábhartha faoin bhforbairt nó criosú talún faoi na hAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt 2000 chuig 2014
A communication about obtaining planning permission to build or extend your principal private residence is considered an excepted communication and therefore not lobbying
Meastar cumarsáid maidir le cead pleanála a fháil chun d’áit chónaitheach phríobháideach phríomha a thógáil nó a shíneadh de bheith ina cumarsáid eiscthe, agus gan bheith ina brústocaireacht dá réir
Under the legislation, your principal private residence is a dwelling or part of a dwelling occupied by you as your only or main residence
De réir na reachtaíochta, is ionann d’áit chónaithe phríobháideach phríomha agus áit chónaithe nó cuid d’áit chónaithe ina gcónaíonn tú mar do phríomháit chónaithe nó an t-aon áit chónaithe agat
It includes your residence’s garden or grounds, up to 1 acre exclusive of the dwelling, which you have for your own occupation and enjoyment
Áirítear léi gairdín agus tailte d’áite cónaithe, suas le 1 acra amháin cé is moite den teach, a bhfuil agat do shaothar nó do thaitneamh

Making your views known to a local authority is not considered to be lobbying if it is part of a formal public consultation process about a development or local area plan or a proposal to zone or re-zone particular lands

Ní cheaptar cur in iúl do dhearcthaí d’údarás áitiúil bheith ina bhrústocaireachta más cuid de phróiseas foirmiúil comhairliúcháin phoiblí é agus má bhaineann sé le plean forbartha nó le plean limistéir áitiúil nó le togra chun tailte faoi leith a chriosú nó a athchriosú
However, if you communicate with a designated public official outside the formal public consultation process you may have to register your lobbying activity
Má dhéanann tú cumarsáid le hoifigeach poiblí ainmnithe lasmuigh den phróiseas foirmiúil comhairliúcháin phoiblí áfach, is amhlaidh a chaitheann tú do ghníomhaíocht brústocaireachta a chlárú
Applications for planning permission and submissions in relation to an application for planning permission are not lobbying
Ní hiad an bhrústocaireacht iad na hiarratais ar chead pleanála agus aighneachtaí i ndáil le hiarratas ar chead pleanála
A communication, however, with a designated public official about a planning application which is outside of the formal planning process may be regarded as lobbying
Féadfar féachaint ar chumarsáid, áfach, le hoifigeach poiblí ainmnithe maidir le hiarratas pleanála a thagann lasmuigh den phróiseas pleanála foirmiúil, mar chumarsáid brústocaireachta
You can find more information in the Commission’s Guidelines on lobbying in relation to development and zoning of land
Is féidir leat teacht ar a thuilleadh eolais i dTreoirlínte an Choimisiúin don bhrústocaireacht i ndáil le forbairt agus criosú talún
Since 1 September 2015, if you are carrying on lobbying activities you must register at lobbying.ie
Caithfidh tú clárú ag lobbying.ie ó 1 Meán Fómhair 2015 má bhíonn tú i mbun gníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta
If you start lobbying between:
Má thosaíonn tú ag brústocaireacht idir:
• 1 September and 31 December, you must register by 21 January
• 1 Meán Fómhair agus 31 Nollaig, ní foláir duit clárú faoi 21 Eanáir
• 1 January and 30 April, you must register by 21 May
• 1 Eanáir agus 30 Aibreán, ní foláir duit clárú faoi 21 Bealtaine
• 1 May and 31 August, you must register by 21 September
• 1 Bealtaine agus 31 Lúnasa, ní foláir duit clárú faoi 21 Meán Fómhair
You must provide the following information when registering:
Caitheann tú an fhaisnéis seo a leanas a sholáthar nuair a chláraítear:
• The address (or principal address) at which you carry on business or (if there is no such address) the address at which you normally live
• An seoladh (nó an príomhsheoladh) ag a mbíonn tú i mbun gnó nó (murab ann don seoladh úd) an seoladh ag a ngnáthchónaíonn tú
• Your business or main activities
• Do ghnó nó príomhghníomhaíochtaí
• Any e-mail address, telephone number or website address relating to your business or main activities
• Aon seoladh ríomhphoist, uimhir ghutháin nó seoladh láithreáin ghréasáin a bhaineann le do ghnó nó príomhghníomhaíochtaí
• Any registration number issued to you by the Companies Registration Office
• Aon uimhir chlárúcháin a eisítear leat ón Oifig um Chlárú Cuideachtaí
• If a company, your registered office
• Más cuideachta í, d’oifig chláraithe
You must also make returns about your lobbying activities during each of the above periods within 21 days of the end of the period
Caithfidh tú tuairisceáin i leith do ghníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta a dhéanamh freisin i rith gach aon cheann de na tréimhsí thuas laistigh de 21 lá ó dheireadh na tréimhse
You have to provide the following:
Caithfidh tú an méid seo a leanas a sholáthar:
• Where the lobbying was carried out on behalf of someone else, information about that person
• An áit a ndearnadh an bhrústocaireacht ar son duine éigin eile, faisnéis faoin duine sin
• The designated public officials who were lobbied and the public body by which they are employed or in which they hold any office or other position
• Na hoifigigh phoiblí ainmnithe a ndearnadh brústocaireacht orthu agus an comhlacht poiblí lena bhfostaítear iad nó ina bhfuil oifig nó post éigin eile acu
• The subject matter of lobbying and the result it was intended to secure
• Ábhar na brústocaireachta agus an toradh a bhíothas ag ceapadh a fháil
• The type and extent of the lobbying activities carried on
• Cineál agus méid na ngníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta a rinneadh
• The name of the individual who had primary responsibility for carrying on the lobbying activities
• Ainm an duine aonair ag a raibh príomhfhreagracht as stiúradh na ngníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta
• The name of each person who is or has been a designated public official employed by or providing services to you, and who was engaged in carrying on lobbying activities
• Ainm gach aon duine ar(bh) oifigeach poiblí ainmnithe iad a fhostaíonn tú nó a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí duit, agus a bhí i mbun na ngníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta
• Any change which has occurred during the period to the information supplied for registration purposes
• Aon athrú a tharla le linn na tréimhse i leith na faisnéise a soláthraíodh chun críocha clárúcháin
If there has been no lobbying activity during the period, your return must state that
Caithfear sloinneadh i do thuairisceán mura ndearadh aon ghníomhaíocht brústocaireachta i rith na tréimhse
You do not have to make a return if your entry in the Register indicates that you have permanently ceased to carry on lobbying activities
Ní chaitheann tú tuairisceán a dhéanamh má thásctar le d’iontráil sa Chlár gur tháinig do ghníomhaíochtaí brústocaireachta chur críche go buan
The Register of Lobbying is available to view for free on the lobbying.ie website
Bíonn An Clár Brústocaireachta ar fáil le hamharc air saor in aisce ar láithreán gréasáin lobbying.ie
When the lobbying activity returns are made, it will hold information about:
Gheofar faisnéis sna tuairisceáin ghníomhaíochta brústocaireachta nuair a dhéantar iad faoi:
• Who is lobbying and on whose behalf lobbying is being carried out
• Na dreamanna atá i mbun brústocaireachta agus na dreamanna a ndéantar brústocaireacht ar a sonsan
• Who is being lobbied
• Na dreamanna a bhfuiltear á mbrústocaireacht
• The issues involved and the intended result of the lobbying
• Na saincheisteanna lena mbaineann agus toradh ceaptha na brústocaireachta
The Commission has information for the public as well as information for lobbyists on its website
Tá faisnéis don phobal chomh maith le faisnéis do bhrústocairí ag an gCoimisiún ar a láithreán gréasáin
